heading: HR01063
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON GAMES AND AMUSEMENTS TO PROBE GENERAL SECURITY AND EMERGENCY PROTOCOLS AFTER A LONE GUNMAN WAS ABLE TO SURREPTITIOUSLY ENTER RESORTS WORLD MANILA WITH A HIGH-POWERED GUN AND CONTAINERS OF GASOLINE WITH WHICH HE SET BACCARAT TABLES ON FIRE KILLING THIRTY-SEVEN (37) PEOPLE IN THE WAKE OF THE FIRE HE STARTED IN THE EARLY HOURS OF JUNE 2, 2017
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-07-25
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01063
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON GAMES AND AMUSEMENTS TO PROBE GENERAL SECURITY AND EMERGENCY PROTOCOLS AFTER A LONE GUNMAN WAS ABLE TO SURREPTITIOUSLY ENTER RESORTS WORLD MANILA WITH A HIGH-POWERED GUN AND CONTAINERS OF GASOLINE WITH WHICH HE SET BACCARAT TABLES ON FIRE KILLING THIRTY-SEVEN (37) PEOPLE IN THE WAKE OF THE FIRE HE STARTED IN THE EARLY HOURS OF JUNE 2, 2017
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE", BATOCABE, RODEL M.
DATE FILED : 2017-06-05
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2017-07-25
